name: part_001
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】あくあ色すーぱーみらくる☆どり〜む♪【#湊あくあ3Dライブ 】 [gf7RSwmp8dM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: The video starts with a recap of previous live dates and a countdown leading into the performance of 'Aqua Iro Super Miracle Dream'.
Performance of the song 'Aqua Iro Super Miracle Dream'.
Minato Aqua addresses the audience during an instrumental break in the song.
Performance of 'Aqua Iro Super Miracle Dream' continues to its conclusion.

subtitles.original: ご主人、ゲームしよ！
subtitles.english: Master, let's play a game!

subtitles.original:
For The Win-Win-Win For The Win-Win-Win
信じててね 大丈夫
subtitles.english:
For the Win-Win-Win, For the Win-Win-Win
Please believe in me, it'll be okay

subtitles.original: あくあ色に染めるよ 君と歩くこの未来を
subtitles.english: I'll dye it in Aqua-color, this future I walk with you

subtitles.original: 自分らしさはどこだろう 自分なりに探しても
subtitles.english: Where is my true self? Even if I search in my own way

subtitles.original: 上手くいかない事だらけよ 仕方ないな
subtitles.english: It's full of things that don't go well, but it can't be helped

subtitles.original:
空回りしちゃって 失敗して 笑われたって
頑張って頑張って ここにいる
subtitles.english:
Even if I spin my wheels, fail, and get laughed at,
I'm doing my best, doing my best, and I'm right here

subtitles.original: 君も同じだよ 諦めなきゃきっと掴めるから
subtitles.english: You're the same too, if you don't give up, I'm sure you can grasp it

subtitles.original:
For The Win-Win-Win For The Win-Win-Win
夢は叫べば 今ここで
subtitles.english:
For the Win-Win-Win, For the Win-Win-Win
If you shout out your dreams, right here and now

subtitles.original: 叶えたいものは何？ 一つ教えてよ
subtitles.english: What is it you want to fulfill? Tell me one thing

subtitles.original:
For The Win-Win-Win For The Win-Win-Win
信じるだけ 出来るでしょ
subtitles.english:
For the Win-Win-Win, For the Win-Win-Win
Just believe, you can do it, right?

subtitles.original: 走り出したその先は あくあ色の未来を
subtitles.english: Beyond where you've started running is an Aqua-colored future

subtitles.original: A！ Q！ U！ A！
subtitles.english: A! Q! U! A!

subtitles.original: 行くよ レッツゴー！ Fight me!
subtitles.english: Here I go, let's go! Fight me!

subtitles.original: A！ Q！ U！ A！
subtitles.english: A! Q! U! A!

subtitles.original: Yes! あくあ For The Win!
subtitles.english: Yes! Aqua, For The Win!

subtitles.original: 伝えるのは下手だから 誤解しないで聞いてよね
subtitles.english: I'm not good at expressing myself, so please listen without misunderstanding

subtitles.original: 私なりの応援だから 分かるでしょ？
subtitles.english: It's my own way of cheering, you understand, right?

subtitles.original:
ねえ 笑ったって泣いたって 一度きり
頑張って頑張って ここに来た
subtitles.english:
Hey, whether laughing or crying, you only live once
I did my best, did my best, and came here

subtitles.original: 君がいなきゃ絶対 辿り着けなかった場所だから
subtitles.english: Because this is a place I never could have reached without you

subtitles.original:
For The Win-Win-Win For The Win-Win-Win
今度はギュッと 私から
subtitles.english:
For the Win-Win-Win, For the Win-Win-Win
This time, I'll give you a tight hug

subtitles.original: 君の背中を押すよ 強く優しくね
subtitles.english: I'll push you forward, strongly yet gently

subtitles.original:
For The Win-Win-Win For The Win-Win-Win
前を向いて 最後まで
subtitles.english:
For the Win-Win-Win, For the Win-Win-Win
Look forward, until the very end

subtitles.original: 見たことのない世界 一緒に旅しようよ
subtitles.english: Let's travel together to a world we've never seen before

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: 今日は3Dライブ見に来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to see the 3D live today!

subtitles.original: 銀河一アイドル湊あくあ、いっぱい歌うから
subtitles.english: The universe's #1 idol, Minato Aqua, will be singing a lot

subtitles.original: みんなたくさんコメントしてね！
subtitles.english: So please leave lots of comments!

subtitles.original: よかったら「A-Q-U-A」のところ、コメントで
subtitles.english: If you'd like, during the "A-Q-U-A" part

subtitles.original: 「A-Q-U-A！あくあしか勝たん！」って言ってね！
subtitles.english: please comment "A-Q-U-A! Aqua's the best!"

subtitles.original: 負けたくない悔し涙が 溢れた日ですらも
subtitles.english: Even the days when tears of frustration overflowed because I didn't want to lose

subtitles.original: 無駄じゃない 自分らしさを創ってく
subtitles.english: Weren't in vain, they go on to create who I am

subtitles.original:
だから 大丈夫大丈夫 心配ないよ
大丈夫大丈夫 全力で
subtitles.english:
So it's okay, it's okay, no need to worry
It's okay, it's okay, with everything I've got

subtitles.original: 走り抜けたんだ 君なら出来るさ
subtitles.english: I ran through it all, you can do it too

subtitles.original: 喜びも悲しみも 分かち合える人がいる
subtitles.english: There are people I can share both joy and sadness with

subtitles.original: 初めて気づいたんだ 一人じゃないんだって
subtitles.english: I realized for the first time that I'm not alone

subtitles.original:
For The Win-Win-Win For The Win-Win-Win
あなた達と叶えたい
subtitles.english:
For the Win-Win-Win, For the Win-Win-Win
I want to fulfill it with all of you

subtitles.original: 夢はきっとこの場所で あくあ色に輝く
subtitles.english: My dream will surely shine in Aqua-color right here

subtitles.original: A！ Q！ U！ A！
subtitles.english: A! Q! U! A!

subtitles.original: 行くよ レッツゴー！ Fight me!
subtitles.english: Here I go, let's go! Fight me!

subtitles.original: A！ Q！ U！ A！
subtitles.english: A! Q! U! A!

subtitles.original: Yes! あくあ For The Win!
subtitles.english: Yes! Aqua, For The Win!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: ダメじゃない できないんだ どや！
subtitles.english: It's not that I'm bad at it, I just can't do it! Hah!

subtitles.original: あっちこっちそっちで噂の駄目天使
subtitles.english: The useless angel rumored here, there, and everywhere

subtitles.original: ダメな子ほどもっと手間暇パワーで補って
subtitles.english: The more useless the child, the more time and effort power is needed to compensate
